mapper.select: select id, member_id, create_time, change_count, note, source_tyoe from ums_integration_change_history where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ums_integration_change_history(member_id, create_time, change_count, note, source_tyoe) values (#{memberId}, #{createTime}, #{changeCount}, #{note}, #{sourceTyoe})

insert into ums_integration_change_history(member_id, create_time, change_count, note, source_tyoe) values
(#{entity.memberId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.changeCount}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.sourceTyoe})

insert into ums_integration_change_history(member_id, create_time, change_count, note, source_tyoe) values
(#{entity.memberId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.changeCount}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.sourceTyoe})
on duplicate key update member_id = values(member_id), create_time = values(create_time), change_count = values(change_count), note = values(note), source_tyoe = values(source_tyoe)
mapper.update:
update ums_integration_change_history
member_id = #{memberId},
create_time = #{createTime},
change_count = #{changeCount},
note = #{note},
source_tyoe = #{sourceTyoe},
where id = #{id}
